Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the XYZ milling machine.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) used on the Mazak Nexus CN 410A-11 CNC machine (serial no. 213853), is prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that workers liable to be exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) and stainless steel welding fume (a respiratory sensitiser) are under suitable health surveillance.
